TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AuthenticationSchemeSelector extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function AuthenticationSchemeSelector(httpRequest As HttpListenerRequest) As AuthenticationSchemes

param.name: httpRequest
param.span: 要为其选择身份验证方案的 实例。

span.span: The instance for which to select an authentication scheme.

summary.span: 为 实例选择身份验证方案。

span.span: Selects the authentication scheme for an instance.

returns.span: 值之一，指示要用于指定的客户端请求的身份验证方法。

span.span: One of the values that indicates the method of authentication to use for the specified client request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型的委托由实例选择的身份验证方案基于请求的特征。Delegates of this type are used by instances to select an authentication scheme based on the characteristics of a request. 委托传递根本未提供身份验证信息每个传入请求的对象。An delegate is passed an object for each incoming request that has not provided authentication information. 由委托调用的方法使用对象和任何其他可用信息来确定需要哪些身份验证方案。The method invoked by the delegate uses the object and any other available information to decide which authentication scheme to require. 使用指定的委托属性。The delegate is specified by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例使用此类型的实例设置属性。The following example uses an instance of this type to set the property. [!code-csharp[NCLListener#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[NCLListener#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#2)] 下面的示例显示由调用的方法的实现委托在前面的示例。The following example shows the implementation of the method invoked by the delegate in the previous example. [!code-csharp[NCLListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#1)]
